targets.rawSql:
SELECT time, value as c
FROM history_float
WHERE
  device='$device' and
  path='axes/c/temperature' and
  $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT time, value as x
FROM history_float
WHERE
  device='$device' and
  path='axes/x/temperature' and
  $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT time, value as y
FROM history_float
WHERE
  device='$device' and
  path='axes/y/temperature' and
  $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT time, value as z
FROM history_float
WHERE
  device='$device' and
  path='axes/z/temperature' and
  $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT time, value as c2
FROM history_float
WHERE
  device='$device' and
  path='axes/c2/temperature' and
  $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT time, value as coolant
FROM history_float
WHERE
  device='$device' and
  path='systems/coolant/temperature' and
  $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT time, value as c
FROM history_float
WHERE
  device='$device' and
  path='axes/c/load' and
  $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT time, value as x
FROM history_float
WHERE
  device='$device' and
  path='axes/x/load' and
  $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT time, value as y
FROM history_float
WHERE
  device='$device' and
  path='axes/y/load' and
  $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT time, value as z
FROM history_float
WHERE
  device='$device' and
  path='axes/z/load' and
  $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT time, value as c2
FROM history_float
WHERE
  device='$device' and
  path='axes/c2/load' and
  $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT time, value as "Availability"
-- FROM history_text
FROM get_timeline('$device', 'availability', $__from, $__to)
-- WHERE 
--   device='$device' and
--   path='availability' and $__timeFilter("time")
-- ORDER BY time

SELECT time, value as "Rotary Mode"
FROM get_timeline('$device', 'axes/c/rotary_mode', $__from, $__to)
-- FROM history_text
-- WHERE 
--   device='$device' and
--   path='axes/c/rotary-mode' and $__timeFilter("time")
-- ORDER BY time

SELECT time, value as "Electric Power"
FROM get_timeline('$device', 'systems/electric/power_state', $__from, $__to)
-- FROM history_text
-- WHERE 
--   device='$device' and
--   path='systems/electric/power-state' and $__timeFilter("time")
-- ORDER BY time

SELECT time, value as "Emergency Stop"
FROM get_timeline('$device', 'controller/emergency_stop', $__from, $__to)
-- FROM history_text
-- WHERE 
--   device='$device' and
--   path='controller/emergency-stop' and $__timeFilter("time")
-- ORDER BY time

SELECT time, value as "Execution"
FROM get_timeline('$device', 'controller/path/execution', $__from, $__to)
-- FROM history_text
-- WHERE 
--   device='$device' and
--   path='controller/path/execution' and $__timeFilter("time")
-- ORDER BY time

SELECT time, value as "System Condition"
FROM get_timeline('$device', 'system_condition', $__from, $__to)
-- FROM history_text
-- WHERE 
--   device='$device' and
--   path='system-condition' and $__timeFilter("time")
-- ORDER BY time

SELECT time, value as "Controller Mode"
FROM get_timeline('$device', 'controller/path/controller_mode', $__from, $__to)
-- FROM history_text
-- WHERE 
--   device='$device' and
--   path='controller/path/controller-mode' and $__timeFilter("time")
-- ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time,
  value
FROM history_float
WHERE
  device='$device' and
  path='controller/path/path_feedrate-actual' and
  $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT time, value as Actual
FROM history_float
WHERE
  device='$device' and
  -- path='axes/c/spindle_speed-actual' and
  path='axes/c/rotary_velocity-actual' and
  $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT time, value as Override
FROM history_float
WHERE
  -- path='axes/c/spindle-speed-override' and
  path='controller/path/rotary_velocity_override' and
  $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT
  time,
  value as x
FROM history_float
WHERE 
  device='$device' and
  path='axes/x/position-commanded' and
  $__timeFilter("time");

SELECT
  time,
  value as y
FROM history_float
WHERE 
  device='$device' and
  path='axes/y/position-commanded' and
  $__timeFilter("time");

SELECT
  time,
  value as z
FROM history_float
WHERE 
  device='$device' and
  path='axes/z/position-commanded' and
  $__timeFilter("time");

SELECT
  time,
  value as x
FROM history_float
WHERE 
  device='$device' and
  path='axes/x/position-actual' and
  $__timeFilter("time");

SELECT
  time,
  value as y
FROM history_float
WHERE 
  device='$device' and
  path='axes/y/position-actual' and
  $__timeFilter("time");

SELECT
  time,
  value as z
FROM history_float
WHERE 
  device='$device' and
  path='axes/z/position-actual' and
  $__timeFilter("time");

SELECT time,
  SUM(CASE property WHEN 'axes/x/position-actual' THEN value ELSE 0 END) AS x,
  SUM(CASE property WHEN 'axes/y/position-actual' THEN value ELSE 0 END) AS y
FROM history_float
WHERE 
  device='$device' and
  $__timeFilter("time")
GROUP BY time
;

SELECT time,
  SUM(CASE property WHEN 'axes/x/position-actual' THEN value ELSE 0 END) AS x,
  SUM(CASE property WHEN 'axes/y/position-actual' THEN value ELSE 0 END) AS y,
  SUM(CASE property WHEN 'axes/z/position-actual' THEN value ELSE 0 END) AS z
FROM history_float
WHERE 
  device='$device' and
  $__timeFilter("time")
GROUP BY time
;

SELECT
  path,
  time,
  value
FROM history_all
WHERE
  device='$device' and
  (path LIKE 'controller%'
  OR path IN ('availability', 'load-condition', 'message', 'functional-mode',
  'system-condition', 'controller/emergency-stop', 'axes/c/rotary-mode')
  )
  AND $__timeFilter("time")
order by time desc
limit 100
